indications: Indications prevention of rheumatic fever recurrence, toxoplasmosis [unlicensed]—see section 5.4.7
name: SULFADIAZINE
cautions: Cautions see under Co-trimoxazole; interactions: Appendix 1 (sulfonamides)
side-effects:
Side-effects see under Co-trimoxazole; also
hypothyroidism, benign intracranial hypertension, optic neuropathy
doses: Prevention of rheumatic fever, by mouth, 1 g daily (500 mg daily for patients less than 30 kg)
pregnancy:
Pregnancy neonatal haemolysis and methaemoglobinaemia in third
trimester; fear of increased risk of kernicterus in neonates appears
to be unfounded
